post.content: shouldnt we have this by now ? 1st tip: reboot: "end key + call key + menu" 2nd: android power saver mode ------------------------- 1. screen brightness 10%-15% 2. wifi = off 3. gps = off 4. auto-sync = off 5. background data usage = off 6. use only 2g networks = yes
